name: Himawari Uzumaki (Boruto: Naruto Next Generations)
description:
Himawari trained on 163 images. It has 2 different characters. Young Himawari with her regular outfit and dress and then the older Himawari when she joins the academy with the shinobi outfit. The tag himawari for young Himawari and academyhima for the older Himawari.

If you do not want byakugan eyes, put that into your negative prompt.
